collection_holder_name: The State Historical Society of Missouri
pageContext.collection_title: Missouri Broadcasters Association Radio Archives Collection
pageContext.collection_description: Audio recordings of radio airchecks, station IDs, and broadcasts collected by the Missouri Broadcasters Association as part of a pilot program for the Library of Congressâ€™ Radio Preservation Task Force. The collection contains audio digitized by Missouri radio stations, along with a small amount of original recordings and other material.
pageContext.collection_extent: 8.34 GB of digital files, 2 audio cassettes, 7 audio tapes, 17 CDs
